pages.text: In Vanilla, you might expect to start by punching a tree. Not in TFC! Scattered all over the ground are rocks and sticks. You will need both. Pick them up by $(4)right-clicking $(). $(br2)Once you have at least two rocks, hold them in your hand. $(4)Right-clicking$() will open the $(thing)knapping interface. $(4)Left-click$() in the shape of the recipes on the opposite page to make an axe and two knives.
The next step is to craft your tool heads with sticks to make stone tools.
